programme.title: Coroner
programme.desc:

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:
Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2019

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S07EP17) When, Murdoch risks his own life to diffuse it an anti-progress zealot straps a bomb to a factory owner.
Année : 2008
Avec : Yannick Bisson (Detective William Murdoch) Hélène Joy (Dr. Julia Ogden) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree) Georgina Reilly (Dr. Emily Grace)

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
The Tetra Society's focus is to find solutions to overcome environmental barriers faced by people with disabilities, including sex toys. In this episode, we'll follow each step of a request being fulfilled.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Dish With Mary
programme.desc:
(S02EP01) You'll be hooked after you try Halifax-based Instagram food influencer Andy Hay's fish tacos with mango slaw, paired with a mocktail Margarita. It's an East Coast food fiesta you won't want to miss.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S02EP10) Jack and Elizabeth experience a life-threatening ordeal, which makes them realize what's been keeping them apart. Later, a surprising arrest is made and a proposal takes place.
Année : 2014

programme.title: The Invincible James Lee
programme.desc:
James Lee is a husband, father, avid athlete, and is about to become a double amputee. Follow James on his journey, from early doctor's appointments to the surgery room and eventual recovery.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Sitting Tall: The Patrick Anderson Story
programme.desc:
Sitting Tall: The Patrick Anderson Story examines the background and career of Patrick Anderson, arguably the greatest wheelchair basketball player of all time as he prepares for the 2020 Paralympic Games in Tokyo.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S06EP03) Murdoch suspects a serial killer is at work when a string of seemingly random people are murdered inside their own homes. The only apparent connection between the victims is a street corner that they all visited shortly before dying.
Année : 2008

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: That Sex Show
programme.desc:
(S01EP04) From puberty to old age, disability impacts our sex lives in big and small ways. Rachele examines the way our needs and desires change throughout the course of our lives.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S02EP02) Philiz is a ball of energy who struggles with chronic fatigue. After getting stuck in a style rut during her recovery, she's on the hunt for elevated, accessible pieces to take her to the next level.
Année : 2022

programme.title: Frankie Drake: détective privée
programme.desc:
(S01EP06) After a shooting injures the young son of a friend, Frankie and Trudy's investigation leads them into the dangerous world of bootlegging.
Année : 2017
